snippet: LEAD: A Democrat who had been barred by the Roman Catholic Bishop here from receiving communion because of her support for abortion rights won election to the California Senate Tuesday night. The result tipped the balance of the Legislature in fav...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Democrat who had been barred by the Roman Catholic Bishop here from receiving communion because of her support for abortion rights won election to the California Senate Tuesday night. The result tipped the balance of the Legislature in favor of abortion rights for the first time in several years.

headline.main: Democrat Penalized by Church In Abortion Stand Wins Election

byline.original: By Special to The New Yorke Times, Special to The New York Times
